pr_title: Add route support to http server metrics.

timeline.bodyText: rename it routed like the original method.
timeline.author: vietj

replies.bodyText: I had it that way but it created an overload issue when not also returning the same type, which is not really possible here. Ideas?
replies.author: jekkel

timeline.bodyText: rather route than routeName, in practice the literal route value is provided by vertx-web
timeline.author: vietj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -412,4 +412,15 @@ default int cookieCount() {
    */
   Map<String, Cookie> cookieMap();
 
+	/**
+	 * Marks this request as being routed to the given route. This is purely informational and is
+	 * being provided to metrics.
+	 *
+	 * @param routeName The name of the route this request has been routed to.
+	 */
+	@Fluent
+	default HttpServerRequest routed(String routeName) {

timeline.message:
Add route support to http server metrics.

Signed-off-by: Jörg Eichhorn <joerg.eichhorn@kiwigrid.com>

route metrics: ignore `routed()` if it's too late

Signed-off-by: Jörg Eichhorn <joerg.eichhorn@kiwigrid.com>
